name: qualys-iac-scan
description: Scan Infrastructure as Code templates for security vulnerabilities using Qualys CloudView
author: OCC CSO

inputs.name: qualysBaseUrl
inputs.label: Qualys Base URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The base URL for your Qualys API endpoint (e.g., https://qualysapi.qualys.com or https://qualysapi.qg2.apps.qualys.com)

inputs.name: qualysPassword
inputs.label: Qualys Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for Qualys API authentication (use secret variable)

inputs.name: iacTemplateDir
inputs.label: IaC Template Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory containing Infrastructure as Code templates to scan

inputs.name: scanName
inputs.label: Scan Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name for the scan (defaults to build-specific name)

inputs.name: pollInterval
inputs.label: Poll Interval (seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: How often to check for scan completion (in seconds)

inputs.name: pollTimeout
inputs.label: Poll Timeout (seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum time to wait for scan completion (in seconds)

inputs.name: customCaBundle
inputs.label: Custom CA Bundle Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to custom CA bundle file for SSL verification (optional)

inputs.name: failOnFindings
inputs.label: Fail Build on Security Findings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to fail the build if security vulnerabilities are found
